description: From Ottoman Turkish صوفته‎ (“theology student”) (modern Turkish softa), from Persian سوخته‎.

entries.meaning: (Islam) A religious student, especially in Turkey
examples: The softas, concerning whose exploits we have heard so much of late, are the theological students who wish to become ulemas, or, literally, learned men.

entries.meaning: (by extension) A fanatic adherent, blind follower
